doctor.name: Mahfuza Afroz Shathi
doctor.degree: BSc & MS (Food & Nutrition), PhD-Fellow (Nutritional Biochemistry), CCD (Advanced Dietetics)
doctor.info: Mahfuza Afroz Shathi is a Nutritionist in Chittagong. Her qualification is BSc & MS (Food & Nutrition), PhD-Fellow (Nutritional Biochemistry), CCD (Advanced Dietetics). She is a Chief Dietician & Nutritionist, Nutrition & Diet Management at Apollo Imperial Hospital, Chittagong. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Apollo Imperial Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Mahfuza Afroz Shathi at Apollo Imperial Hospital, Chittagong is 9am to 1pm & 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Hasina Akhter Lipi
doctor.info: Hasina Akhter Lipi is a Nutritionist in Chittagong. Her qualification is B.Sc, M.Sc (Food & Nutrition), DU. She is a Consultant, Diet & Nutrition at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Chittagong. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Chattogram. Practicing hour of Hasina Akhter Lipi at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Chattogram is 5pm to 7pm (Sun, Tue & Thu).

doctor.name: Nutritionist Iqbal Hossain
doctor.info: Nutritionist Iqbal Hossain is a Nutritionist in Chittagong. His qualification is BCS (Hons), MSC (Applied Nutrition & Food Technology). He is a Consultant, Nutrition & Diet Management at Chittagong Diabetic General Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Surgiscope Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Nutritionist Iqbal Hossain at Surgiscope Hospital, Chittagong is 6.30pm to 9.30pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Sharmin Sultana
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), MPhil (Biochemistry), MSc (Nutrition & Food Science)
doctor.workplace: National Hospital Chittagong & Sigma Lab Ltd.
doctor.info: Dr. Sharmin Sultana is a Food & Nutrition specialist in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MPhil (Biochemistry), MSc (Nutrition & Food Science). She is a Consultant, Food and Nutrition at National Hospital Chittagong & Sigma Lab Ltd.. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at National Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Sharmin Sultana at National Hospital, Chittagong is 3pm to 5pm (Sunday to Thursday).
